_meta.note: expectedConfidence is determined by actual Intl.Segmenter("th") on THIS machine. ICU version differences across machines may cause confidence mismatches — treat as soft warning. Negative cases: term intentionally absent from text. Acceptance thresholds (FR43): false-negative < 5%, false-positive < 10%.

schema.expectedFound: true if term should be found
schema.expectedConfidence: high | low | null (null if not found)
